items.content_html: This repository contains a lightweight chatbot built from scratch without any UI libraries. It is designed to be highly customizable and extendable, allowing developers to create their own user interfaces while focusing on chatbot logic and functionality.
items.title: SjaDrwsh/chatbot-ui-component: This repository contains a lightweight chatbot built from scratch without any UI libraries. It is designed to be highly customizable and extendable, allowing developers to create their own user interfaces while focusing on chatbot logic and functionality.
